recent.text:
In addition to these speakers, there will be more yet smart people giving talks on the Agency Day, and lightening talks in the evening too!

I might need to make some room in my brain for all this.

I'm going to forget all the levels from Doom & Doom 2.
And how to speak Spanish.

...but the portrait artist has been called in to update the picture of your spanked arse of a face as the entry for 'heamorrhoid'.

Thanks @contentful!
This is going to be great.

Too much fun over the weekend playing with @eleven_ty to rebuild my website.
I wanted:

- Data sourced from @benotist, Twitter, IG
- Easily theme-able blog pages with little CSS
- Solid Lighthouse score
- Lighter/fun development experience

https://t.co/HnuHCkX7Qd so far...
